channel.title: R.I.P. Tonypker13
channel.description:
As some of you may or may not have known, our dear friend Tonypker13 has left us. He was hit by a bus, as soon as his friends called 911, the paramedics rushed him to the hospital, but a short while later, he died. As his sister Suzy describes, it took them several minutes to get there. (I'm good friends with tony, so she texted me when it was going on) As she describes, he was skateboarding with his friends, they were skating by the bus stop. I'd rather not explain it, it's tearing me up, it's terribly tragic what happened to this poor guy. Since I've been a good friend with tony for a while, I think that it'd be best if I posted this topic to let you guys know.
R.I.P. Tony, may your soul rest my friend.

item.title: R.I.P. Tonypker13
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“jme, post:36, topic:325850”]Yeah since my time at kaitnieks until now, I swear there has been nearly 100 death topics. Vast majority of them were proven to be false in the end. And pretty much only 2 of them have ever been proven.

I don’t think anyone in this thread means any disrespect if what happened is true. But because of the nature of this community, it’s hard to convince people about these sorts of things. Think “the boy who cried wolf”[/quote]
I don’t know of as many, but I can remember a few, the most recent being:

I have cancer

Some real proof would be nice. If he really was banned, then it would not be far fetched that he would fake it as he cannot reply on forums anyway.

If he actually did die: RIP

Read full topic

item.title: R.I.P. Tonypker13
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

[quote=“Aeolian., post:30, topic:325850”]Rich` Has no soul what’s so ever, for someone too be killed by a bus, that has been in this community, and if you look at his post “many memorys”

who gives a shit

Your lucky you still live on earth.[/quote]

You guys don’t understand how many times people have posted fake death topics in order to get attention. Until someone has provided proof, we will unfortunately treat it as a fake death topic.

item.title: R.I.P. Tonypker13
item.dc:creator: @Aeolian Aeolian.
item.description:
@Aeolian wrote:

Tryed, too leave that message what i said about Richso everyone would understand the meaning of this topic, we don't need your flame Tonypker13, was a very good hearten guy, if this was true or fake, doesn’t matter i will still stand by anyone that has been in a accident.

Poem:
“No one never cared about the rose that grew from the crack in the floor”

Tonypker13: He died by a bus, & no one really cared for him only his family and most of his friends from moparscape, everyone would rather hate on him because of his past, well Tonypker13 is gone.

Please don’t flame or give self centered comments on this thread.

Read full topic

item.title: R.I.P. Tonypker13
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

[quote="-shock-, post:32, topic:325850"]It doesn’t matter if you didn’t like the guy,
It doesn’t matter if you viewed him as a dick.

This is a thread about his death, not flaming him.

If there was a funeral for someone you hate, you wouldn’t just burst in and yell “THAT GUYS A DICK” or “WHO GIVES A SHIT”!
People will hate you in your lifetime (I know I now do), would you like to have them do something like this after you die?

Keep in mind, I’ve never heard of this guy, its just so… sick… to troll in a thread about someones death. Disgusting.[/quote]
Thank you

Read full topic

item.title: R.I.P. Tonypker13
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

Clap until you hands hurt,
Standing ovations or b-b-b-boos
W-wa-watch us until we blur,
Walk off into the sunset
Tell rock’n’roll
I’m alone again
I want to pick
The mid west home again
Your time has passed
They say never means never
So the fast dance won’t last
But never means forever
Never means forever

Read full topic

item.title: R.I.P. Tonypker13
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

It’s always fucked up when someone in the same age group as me, if not younger, dies because it gets you thinking. Here’s a conversation I had with him back in February 2009 on Ry60003333’s forums.

Hey
« Sent to: Tonypker on: February 12, 2009, 11:38:16 pm »

Hey. Are you Tonypker13 from the moparscape forums?
[hr]

Re: Hey
« Sent to: Bill on: February 12, 2009, 11:40:10 pm »

Yep
One of Ry’s friends as well
[hr]

Re: Hey
« Sent to: Tonypker on: February 12, 2009, 11:42:24 pm »

Nice I’m runefreak10 from the forums. How long have you known Ry?
[hr]

Re: Hey
« Sent to: Bill on: February 12, 2009, 11:44:45 pm »

Well, he was about the only non idiotic poster on Moparscape, and me and him got along just fine =]
We never argued, and I always looked at him as a friend.
I 1st talked to him the day I signed up, maybe 9 months ago
[hr]

Re: Hey
« Sent to: Tonypker on: February 12, 2009, 11:47:15 pm »

Yeah… Ryan know A LOT of java coding for 15 and I think I saw you on the rsbot forums too…? Lol.
[hr]

Re: Hey
« Sent to: Bill on: February 12, 2009, 11:49:11 pm »

Me and Him both know a lot of Java
I’m 14 (15 in april) and I’ve known Java for 6 years now XD
About to start posting tutorials.

Yea, I’m on the RSBot forums to, I’m a V.I.P Scripter since I know Java =D
[hr]

Re: Hey
« Sent to: Tonypker on: February 12, 2009, 11:54:17 pm »

I stopped using it once I got banned lol… I got to 81 woodcutting with it and over 26k willows with it, but I guess it’s my fault for getting banned o.O but at least I wasn’t like those guys that use it on their main. I might get back into it. Have you made any scripts? And how were you learning java at 8? What did you do and use?
[hr]

Re: Hey
« Sent to: Bill on: February 12, 2009, 11:57:06 pm »

I’ve been WC botting for like 2 weeks, almost 92 atm.
I make a LOTTT of scripts, my latest one was Shilo Village fisher.

I can explain the Java thing.
My dad, worked at Dell as a programmer and he was an original producer in the Java project.
He LOVED programming, and I wanted to try it out.
So I did.

I almost stopped programming, but my dad died last July and I wanted to carry on his love for it, so I decided to =D
[hr]

Re: Hey
« Sent to: Tonypker on: February 13, 2009, 12:00:14 am »

I wish I had an advantage like that. Do you mind me asking how your dad died?
[hr]

Re: Hey
« Sent to: Bill on: February 13, 2009, 12:01:46 am »

He had mannyyyyy health problems, including Heart Failure.
He had a heart attack in front of me, and died
[hr]

Re: Hey
« Sent to: Tonypker on: February 13, 2009, 12:07:59 am »

You probably don’t want to talk about it so sorry for asking and sorry about your dad man :’( it’s gotta be tough…

I didn’t really know him. This was the only time we really had a conversation. I dedicate this conversation to `Lewk_ to give him a little bit more of his close friend. To everyone in this topic who says he was a faggot or “who gives a shit”, then you may go to hell and burn. You don’t know him, at all, so at least show respect for the dead, or shut the fuck up and go elsewhere. You know what? This just goes to prove one thing. People in this community aren’t assholes and retarded fucks just because these are forums on the internet or because this is MoparScape and it just doesn’t matter, they’re assholes and retarded fucks because they really are assholes and retarded fucks. Put everything else MoparScape-related aside for a minute. This is a topic about reality, something 90% of you fail to see. You don’t go to funerals to spit in the coffin. You either go to respect them, or you just don’t go. If you’re that kind of person, then just shut the fuck up and hit the back button.

If a moderator possibly somehow just so happens to find something wrong with this post whatsoever for some reason at all, then go ahead and give me my infraction. All of the above is 100% real and true.

R.I.P. Tony (Not Tonypker13, that’s not his real name. It’s Tony now.)
That is, if all of this is true and he really is dead.

Read full topic
